TITLE: Essay
DEF: A coherent, persuasive piece of writing on a given topic
TASK: The Essays pattern fosters the development of critical thinking, analysis, and communication skills in learners through written assignments. This pattern is effective when it aids in promoting the practice of persuasive and coherent writing. Address common challenges like vague instructions and limited feedback opportunities by offering clear guidance on structure and content, as well as creating opportunities for feedback and revision.
